attributes.action: Low nationalwage and highest bills and taxes ever to pay,how to live in England?
attributes.additional_details: Please consider a better national wage for the people of England. Please consider the people to have a normal life.all people in uk they spend their whole life to work just to pay bills.no one gets to enjoy their real life .because the living expenses are too high even if its Monday to Friday shift they are forced to overtime in weekends too.when 20p or 30p increases per year its not helping at all so please understand and give more pay rise considering the living expense.i kindly humbly request
attributes.background: The country need to open eyes to reality consider humanity.Every year the national wage increase by50por20pwhere at the sametime every year all the bills increase by10£to100£end of the month everyone working like slave getting salary and paid all bills&back to zero.nobody have a life because of that

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  
  
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as increasing the minimum wage.
